Basic Abilities.Name: Holy Light (Q)
Basic Abilities.Description: Heal target ally for 380 Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 190 Health.

Basic Abilities.Name: Holy Radiance (Z)
Basic Abilities.Description: Heal all allies in a line for 160 Health, dealing 160 damage to enemies.

Basic Abilities.Name: Hammer of Justice (E)
Basic Abilities.Description: Deal 114 damage and Stun the target for 0.75 seconds.

Basic Abilities.Name: Devotion (D)
Basic Abilities.Description: HHeroes healed by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 25 amor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself. Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

Heroic Abilities.Name: Divine Shield (R1)
Heroic Abilities.Description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

Heroic Abilities.Name: Divine Storm (R2)
Heroic Abilities.Description: Deal 187 damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

Tier 1.Name: Silver Touch
Tier 1.Description:
Quest : Reduce damage from Heroic sources with devotion. 
			Reward : After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. 
			Reward : After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%

Tier 1.Name: Wave of Light
Tier 1.Description:
Quest : Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. 
			Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 1 second. 
			Passive : Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 8 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

Tier 1.Name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
Tier 1.Description:
Quest : Basic Attack enemies 75 times. 
			Reward : Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds. 
			Passive : Basic Attacks restore 1.50% of Uther's maximum Mana

Tier 4.Name: Holy Shock
Tier 4.Description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana

Tier 4.Name: Pursuit of Justice
Tier 4.Description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds

Tier 4.Name: Holy Fire
Tier 4.Description: Deal 16(+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

Tier 7.Name: Armor of Faith
Tier 7.Description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds.

Tier 7.Name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
Tier 7.Description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Amor bonus they receive from Devotion from 25 to 50.

Tier 7.Name: Hand of Protection
Tier 7.Description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

Tier 13.Name: Blessed Champion
Tier 13.Description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allies for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

Tier 13.Name: Well Met
Tier 13.Description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reuces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

Tier 13.Name: Spell Shield
Tier 13.Description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Amor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

Tier 16.Name: Beacon of Light
Tier 16.Description: While below 50% Health, Uther received 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

Tier 16.Name: Tyr's Deliverance
Tier 16.Description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

Tier 16.Name: Benediction
Tier 16.Description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

Tier 20.Name: Bulwark of Light
Tier 20.Description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

Tier 20.Name: Divine Hurricane
Tier 20.Description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

Tier 20.Name: Redemption
Tier 20.Description: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uthers revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

Tier 20.Name: Divine Protection
Tier 20.Description: Devotion now stacks twice, and its duration is refreshed when applied.
